attributes.additional_details:
This is to petition the government to make accessible the information and devices that we  have access to but are denied from in order to generate free and clean energy as oppose to fossil fuels and nuclear .. It is not necessary to continue a day longer raping our planet and to release us from the slavery we are currently in to the oil companies, banks and corruption.
We demand out rights to this information and that we have this choice implemented by our MP 's as a matter of urgency in parliament.
In order for us to relinquish this constant strive for existence and allow us to THRIVE instead
